game.name: Let's Freeze Some Penguins
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Walnut the Walrus sets out to save his friends, and all of Northern Bear, from the dreaded Emperor Penguin. Luckily, his chilly Walrus Wind is ice cold. Now let’s freeze some penguins!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Walnut the Walrus sets out to save his friends, and all of Northern Bear, from the dreaded Emperor Penguin. Luckily, his chilly Walrus Wind is ice cold. Now let’s freeze some penguins!
